title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
**Travel in Style with VINTAR's 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter!**

Are you planning a trip to Italy, Chile, or any of the other 10 countries supported by this versatile adapter? Look no further than the VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug Adapter, designed to make your travel experience seamless and convenient.

**Why Choose VINTAR?**

- **4-in-1 Functionality**: This compact adapter features 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, allowing you to charge up to four devices simultaneously. Perfect for keeping your cell phone, tablet, and power bank powered up, no matter where your adventures take you.
- **Universal Compatibility**: With support for standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs, this adapter is compatible with devices from the USA and other countries. It's a must-have for travelers who need to stay connected.
- **Wide Voltage Range**: Built to handle 100V-250V, this adapter supports dual voltage, making it safe for use with a wide range of electronic devices, from low-power gadgets to higher-wattage essentials.
- **Grounded Safety**: The 3 prong grounded plug ensures that your devices are protected from electrical surges, giving you peace of mind while you travel.
- **Compact and Lightweight**: Measuring just 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches, this adapter is ultra-light and compact, making it easy to slip into your travel bag without adding bulk.
- **Certified Quality**: VINTAR's adapter is CE and FCC certified, guaranteeing that it meets the highest standards of safety and performance.
- **12-Month Warranty**: Backed by a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, you can trust VINTAR to stand behind its products.

**Travel with Confidence:**

- **Ideal for**: Cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other essential electronics.
- **Compatible Countries**: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City.
- **Ultra-Light Design**: Weighing next to nothing, this adapter won't weigh you down on your travels.

**Get Ready for Your Next Adventure!**

Don't let incompatible outlets ruin your travel plans. With VINTAR's Italy Travel Power Adapter, you can charge your devices anywhere, anytime. Order your 3-pack today and enjoy the freedom to travel without worry!

**VINTAR â€“ Your Passport to Seamless Travel Technology.**
